import React, {useState, useEffect} from "react" import ts from "./Tasks.Module.css" const Tasks = (props) => { let [TasksData, SetTasksData] = useState(props.ToDoListTasks.items) useEffect(() => { SetTasksData(props.ToDoListTasks.items) }, [props.ToDoListTasks.items] ) return
